Today in Sutherland, surf is up at 6 ft @ 8s NNW with fresh 15 mph NNE winds. Good spots like Melvich and Strathy are working well, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 3 ft @ 8s WNW and light 15 mph SSE winds, making for a fun day at various beaches. The day after brings a solid 4 ft @ 11s WNW, with winds easing to 12 mph SSW, perfect for catching some quality waves. Best: day after.
